data.title: Peta Murgatroyd, Maksim Chmerkovskiy reveals third baby's name
data.meta_description: Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy announced the name of their son hours after their newborn’s arrival.On Friday, July 12, the couple posted a joint Instagram post revealing their baby's...
data.text:
Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy announced the name of their son hours after their newborn’s arrival.

On Friday, July 12, the couple posted a joint Instagram post revealing their baby's name.

"[blue heart emoji] Milan Maksim Chmerkovskiy [blue heart emoji]," they wrote in the caption of an adorable photo featuring the baby, slightly smiling with pink cheeks.

"Born 8.48am 7/12/24 8 pounds," they shared the baby’s birth details as promised in their last social media post. "The fam is complete [teary eyes emoji]."

Earlier that day, the new parents of three shared the joyous news that they had welcomed their third baby in a joint post.

"He is officially evicted from his mom, and he is sooooo cute!!!!" the excited father wrote. "Birth details later, but for now, we wanted to let you all know that mom and baby are doing perfect."

He expressed gratitude for the heartfelt felicitations the couple received on their new baby’s arrival and ended the caption with the hashtags "#madeinPeta #threepeat [three trophy emoji]."

In addition to Milan, Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy, who tied the knot seven years ago, already share two sons, seven-year-old Shai and Rio, 12 months.
